text: The French Bulldog is a breed of domestic dog. They are a cross between Toy Bulldogs imported from England and local ratters in Paris, France, in the 1800s."Le bouledogue Fran√ßais, Ses origines", 'Official breed club created in 1898 (fr)' The breed is popular as a pet; in 2018, they were the most popular registered dog in the United Kingdom, and in the U.S., the fourth-most popular AKC-registered dog breed. ==References== Category:Dog breeds originating in France Category:FCI breeds
title: French Bulldog
